name: General Carlist Rieekan (V)
Lore: 'One of the original founders of the Rebel Alliance. Former civilian strategist with the House of Organa. Somber leader of Echo Base.',
Text: 'Your artillery weapons at same and related sites are powered and forfeit +2.  Once per turn, may use 1 Force to deploy one A New Secret Base, Echo Base Operations, Haven (to Hoth), a [Hoth] location, a [Hoth] artillery weapon, or a non-unique [Hoth] Rebel from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
